sources.title: Goons from the Moon (1951)
sources.description: The inhabitants of the quiet mouse village are thrown in a panic when it is learned that that a strange planet is approaching. The planet lands and throngs of bat-winged cats attack the mice with strange weapons. But Mighty Mouse arrives and sends the invaders fleeing. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/goons-from-the-moon-1951/

metadata.Plot: The inhabitants of the quiet mouse village are thrown in a panic when it is learned that that a strange planet is approaching. The planet lands and throngs of bat-winged cats attack the mice with strange weapons. But Mighty Mouse arrives and sends the invaders fleeing.
metadata.Writer: Tom Morrison, Bob Kuwahara, Paul Terry
